name: SmilingmindGuidedmeditationforkids
0:
”Alexa, open smiling mind”
”Alexa, play smiling mind”
”Alexa, launch smiling mind”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smiling mind
des:
We want children to be healthy and happy, not just now but for the rest of their lives. And teaching them about meditation early would help them do just that. That’s why we created “Smiling Mind” for Kids.

Skill features over 10 guided meditations designed to help kids visualize. Each day, the "Smiling Mind" skill offers a new meditation of the day.

If you don't like the currently playing meditation you can always say "Play next" to jump to a different meditation. For Alexa Smart Screen devices, you can also tap or say the name of the next meditations available on the screen.


AVAILABLE GUIDED MEDITATIONS:

+ The Magic Carpet
+ Beach Relaxation 
+ Cool at school
+ Lakeside Meditation
+ Enchanted Fall Forest
+ Cozy Castle
+ Shine your Light
+ Remember Easily
+ Our Inner Kingdom


DISCLAIMER:
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
